body.header: What will I learn I in this unit?

ol.li: read a report and complete it with the missing information.
identify words and phrases used to express purpose and cause and result in a report.
complete a report with words and phrases which express purpose and cause and result.
practise writing sentences which express purpose and cause and result.
read a report and identify what the cohesive devices refer to.
practise writing sentences using defining and non- defining relative clauses.
